page.title: 03HONING E.RUSTON JOBS SAMPLE
page.content: The pattern of rural employment has undergone radical change recently as agricultural work declines. Occupations vary much more than formerly, as this survey of the occupations of the parents of some pupils in Honing and E.Ruston schools shows:- Male(full time)1 each of tailor,mill mechanic,electrician,crane operator,draughtsman,driving instructor,engineer,steel erector,fork lift operator,teacher,writer,chicken distributor,mophead assembler, bricklayer.2 each of sawyers,plumbers, farmworkers. Female(full time):- 6 housewives,1 each of pharmacist,T.V. road asst., clerical asst. Female (part time) 3 boat cleaners,1 each of bank clerk,barmaid,glass engraver,DHSS clerk,tailoress,office cleaner,egg packer,laundry manageress,school cleaner, school secretary,home help.
